answer:
There is no central registry of all immunizations provided in BC. You will, however, find tips for locating immunization records here.
Immunization Nurse
answer_formatted:
## There is no central registry of all immunizations provided in BC.


## You will, however, find tips for locating immunization records here.

Immunization Nurse
question: I am being hired by Interior Health and I require records of my school age immunizations. I am from Burnaby originally and was born in 1964. I know I had all required immunizations. Where can I find copies? I have lived in Kelowna for 10 years.
question_variation_0: where can i find copies of my immunizations
question_variation_1: when did i obtain immunization copies
question_variation_2: where to find school age immunization records
